name: Dioptra
headline: Automated contract review with AI
description: We help founders and in-house counsels streamline their contract negotiations to close deals faster. We do this by building your contract negotiation playbooks and automating them with AI.

founders.name: Pierre Arnoux, Founder
founders.description: Pierre has 8+ years of hands-on experience both at IBM Watson and smaller startups. He trained and deployed the first pre-trained  IBM Watson service (personality insights). Pierre worked on different types of models (NLP, Computer Vision, Automated Speech Recognition). He taught a master’s degree class on MLOps at Columbia University. Pierre has a MS in Electrical Engineering from Columbia University.

founders.name: Jacques Arnoux, Founder
founders.description: Jacques is a systems and software engineer with 10+ years of experience in web-scale consumer and enterprise software. He’s an ex-Yahoo and was employee number 8 and lead engineer at Netsil, an application monitoring start-up that was acquired by Nutanix. He built Nutanix’s AiOps business and cloud data-pipeline. Jacques has a Masters degree in Computer Science from the University of Pennsylvania.

# Your trusted contract review AI agent
Derive your playbook from precedents, review agreements consistently and generate redlines in Microsoft Word.
[Sign up](https://dioptra.ai/<https:/form.typeform.com/to/fBxhnHvl?typeform-source=www.dioptra.ai>)[Contact us](https://dioptra.ai/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/farah-gasmi?uuid=c4673e8c-246c-4198-8c58-5479e558cfbd>)
Wondering why people love Dioptra?
“You know this feeling when you have to get your brain going to review a badly drafted agreement? With Diopta, I was able to just drop it in. And a review that would have taken me 45 min of painful intellectual labor was done in 10.”
Senior associate @ Biglaw
Virginia
"Dioptra is producing, by far, the best quality redlines from all the tools I tested. And I tested a number!"
Boutique Law Firm Partner
New York City
“What I LOVE about Dioptra is that it helps me quickly figure out what I should be looking for and gives me everything I need to do my review: the company guideline, an explanation of why it’s important and a good draft of the redlines"
Associate @ BigLaw
California
"It's embarrassing to say but Dioptra schooled me a few times on things I missed. It's consistently good."
Chief Commercial Counsel @ Large Tech Company
New York City
"I would never have guessed this redline was done by an AI. It's kind of scary."
Partner @ BigLaw
California
"I tested more than a dozen other redlining tools (CLMs, endpoint solutions, big players etc). This is just the best."
Chief Innovation Officer @ BigLaw
California
"Sometimes the AI is just way smarter than me!"
SMB Business Owner
Canada
"They all say they do redlining (CLMs, end point solution vendors…), but what they really do is rip and replace!"
Partner & Technology Chair @ Biglaw
Illinois
"It was great working with Dioptra. They are fast, reactive. Great product and service"
Founder @ Tech Startup
New York
![left arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/67a5f0cff7a0ece74ac2d16a_licon2.svg)
![right arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/67a5f0cfc2853a95c45345e8_ricon2.svg)
## Trusted by companies big and small

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660405984a3e7b83a1f82e34/66226cfcac3b3547fc808b6b_brainboard.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660405984a3e7b83a1f82e34/6708ee2f841b5a40a58ebc9c_upfront-new-logo.png)

“Dioptra’s accuracy in complex contract review, and the level of autonomy it offers, makes it a substantial breakthrough in legal AI.”
[Read the article](https://dioptra.ai/<https:/www.forbes.com/sites/tomdavenport/2024/06/01/early-adopters-of-gen-ai-in-law/?sh=63dc34113f86>)
# Customizable and Interoperable
From customizable playbooks to surgical redlines right in the Microsoft Word add-in, we’ve got you covered.
[Explore all features![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/670394671a13aa2b11269aba_arrow-right.svg)](https://dioptra.ai/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/6703999b78ae1247076a44ca_Playbooks%20or%20Precedents%40x2.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/67039a14276acf5142762509_book-open-check.svg)
### Playbooks or Precedents
Generate redlines that abide by your playbook. If you don’t have a playbook, Dioptra will create a playbook from past agreements.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/6703a56b575c659bca8dbab9_Word%20Add-in%40x2.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/6703a572e953c5c569cd2479_puzzle.svg)
### Word Add-in
You can review your contract in Word, using Dioptra Add-in. Integrate with your document repository with our APIs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/6703a5822870892e460f34eb_Issues%20Lists%20-%20Summaries%40x2.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/6703a587fde176e4587182f9_elements.svg)
### Issues Lists & Summaries
Generate Issues lists to streamline communication pre-execution, and post execution summaries to surface what’s been signed.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/6703a5911b09d6a89e83b6c6_1st%20-%203rd%20party%20contracts%40x2.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/6703a5a3684a2b255c97de4b_letter-text.svg)
### 1st & 3rd party contracts
Dioptra is consistently accurate for first and third party contracts, equally.
# Transparent and consistently accurate
Our accuracy metrics are end-to-end—from issue detection to redlining outputs. We continuously measure our accuracy on proprietary benchmarking datasets.
### 95%
1st party papers
### 92%
3rd party papers
### 94%
Issue detection
“This is a Sputnik moment. Partner assessment of a piece of work is the hardest test there is, especially when there are sections of a contract that may have 20 different aspects to them, which if changed alter other parts of the agreement. Dioptra does not rip and replace. It minimizes redlining and leverages existing language.”
David Wang
Former CIO of Wilson SonsiniArtificial Lawyer
[Read the article](https://dioptra.ai/<https:/www.artificiallawyer.com/2024/05/14/with-dioptra-wilson-sonsini-launches-super-accurate-ai-doc-review/>)
# Secure by design
Your data is your data. Dioptra is SOC 2 Type II compliant and trusted by the world’s best legal teams.
[Go to Security Portal![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/670394671a13aa2b11269aba_arrow-right.svg)](https://dioptra.ai/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/67092f81ed9a8b7914b14d5a_21972-312_SOC_NonCPA%201%20%40x2.png)
SOC 2 Type II compliant
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/670922b07872c09f1bcad0fc_elements.svg)
No training on user data
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/670923303f746425b5eff5ad_server2.svg)
On-prem deployment
# Use cases
Apply it to real world use cases.
[Read customer stories![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/670394671a13aa2b11269aba_arrow-right.svg)](https://dioptra.ai/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/670509967b528e870891dc1b_ico-commercial-contracts.svg)
#### Commercial Contracts
Dioptra takes the first pass of redlining based on your preferences to accelerate complex contract reviews and automate lower risk contracts.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/67050996c5ec17369b84a66f_ico-low-risk-contract-automation.svg)
#### Low Risk Contract Automation
Automate the review of low risk procurement contracts.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/67050995f6a4ff8b5b8ae1f5_ico-due-diligence.svg)
#### Due Diligence
Detect issues across your suite of legal documents
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/67050995c9b4a63f9eab85d2_ico-nvca-financing.svg)
#### NVCA Financing
Dioptra checks that your financing agreements are consistent and aligned with your term sheet.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/67050996eb1d882ba552f5fa_ico-post-execution-analyses.svg)
#### Post-Execution Analyses
Dioptra extracts terms into individual summaries and/or aggregated reports to keep a holistic view of the past contracts you signed.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/67079a1f410add2b6f10551b_toggle-left.svg)
#### Integrations
Our APIs allow seamless integrations with CLMs and DMS systems.
### Supercharge contract review with Dioptra AI today.
Ready to get started?
[Sign up](https://dioptra.ai/<https:/form.typeform.com/to/fBxhnHvl?typeform-source=www.dioptra.ai>)[Contact us](https://dioptra.ai/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/farah-gasmi?uuid=c4673e8c-246c-4198-8c58-5479e558cfbd>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/66fea6fcee562c98b78f35fa_logo2.svg)

#### Low Risk Contract Automation
Automate the review of low risk procurement contracts.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/67050995f6a4ff8b5b8ae1f5_ico-due-diligence.svg)
#### Due Diligence
Detect issues across your suite of legal documents
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/67050995c9b4a63f9eab85d2_ico-nvca-financing.svg)
#### NVCA Financing
Dioptra checks that your financing agreements are consistent and aligned with your term sheet.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/67050996eb1d882ba552f5fa_ico-post-execution-analyses.svg)
#### Post-Execution Analyses
Dioptra extracts terms into individual summaries and/or aggregated reports to keep a holistic view of the past contracts you signed.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65faf42ce91ad57d166a09e6/67079a1f410add2b6f10551b_toggle-left.svg)
#### Integrations
Our APIs allow seamless integrations with CLMs and DMS systems.
### Supercharge contract review with Dioptra AI today.
Ready to get started?

generated_description:
**Dioptra: Revolutionizing Contract Review with AI**

Founded in 2021 and backed by Y Combinator’s W22 batch, Dioptra is based in New York and aims to transform the way businesses handle contract negotiations. With a mission to automate contract review processes using AI, Dioptra helps founders and in-house counsel close deals faster by streamlining negotiations and providing customizable playbooks.

### What They Do

Dioptra leverages AI to facilitate contract review, allowing users to generate accurate redlines directly in Microsoft Word. The platform is designed to derive playbooks from existing agreements, ensuring that reviews are consistent and aligned with organizational guidelines. 

A standout feature is their new tool, PromptIQ, designed to offer accurate AI assistance at your fingertips. This tool, combined with Dioptra's ability to integrate seamlessly with document repositories, makes contract management more efficient and less labor-intensive.

### Features That Stand Out

- **Playbooks & Customization**: Whether you have a playbook or need to create one, Dioptra can accommodate both, enhancing your review process.
- **Word Add-in**: Users can work comfortably within familiar environments, integrating their operations directly into Microsoft Word.
- **Accuracy Metrics**: Dioptra boasts impressive accuracy rates—95% for first-party documents, 92% for third-party papers, and 94% for issue detection.

### Why It Matters

Contract review is traditionally seen as a tedious and time-consuming task. Dioptra’s AI-powered solution significantly reduces the time it takes to analyze contracts, turning hours of work into mere minutes. As one user noted, a review that usually took 45 minutes of “painful intellectual labor” was completed in just 10 minutes with Dioptra. 

This efficiency is underpinned by Dioptra’s commitment to security, being SOC 2 Type II compliant and ensuring strong data protection practices.

### Who’s Using Dioptra?

Dioptra counts an array of clients among its supporters, from boutique law firms to big tech companies. Testimonials highlight its effectiveness in producing high-quality redlines and providing valuable insights during the review process.

### Conclusion

If you're involved in contract negotiations and looking for a quicker, more reliable way to ensure accuracy and compliance, it's worth exploring what Dioptra has to offer. With a robust combination of AI-driven technology and user-focused features, Dioptra stands as a significant player in the legal tech space.

For more information, check out [Dioptra’s website](https://dioptra.ai/).
